body_html:
It is the main reason that SparseApplyXXX can not run on GPU which compel 'embedding_lookup' to run on CPU and cause the problem.
Maybe we can alter the embedding_lookup CPU implementation to conform with its GPU version. Or we can rewrite 'SparseApplyAdagrad' and 'SparseApplyRMSProp' so that they can run on GPU.
@drpngx
